title.bibl: L'italia, March 17, 1918. Contribution to the Fund for the Relief of Refugees in the Veneto Region

div.bibl: L'Italia, March 17, 1918. CONTRIBUTION TO THE FUND FOR THE RELIEF OF REFUGEES IN THE VENETO REGION

body.p: The Italian Red Cross in Louisville, Kentucky, has raised $210.00. The employees of the John B. Canepa Co. contributed $115.25. Member of Garibaldi Legion contributed $19.00. Vincent Saracco, a private individual, collected eleven dollars. The sculptor, Luigi Romanelli, was the one who prevailed on the Circolo Filodrammatico Italiano to give the proceeds of its dramatic presentation at Hull House to this noble cause. The sum was $20.25. The Circolo has decided to repeat the performance. The Alpine Gun Club donated $429.00. Altogether, it brings the sum contributed, to $1033.85.
